thisLanguageDescription.context: This word describes this language itself IN ENGLISH! DO NOT TRANSLATE THIS!! This phrase must remain in English.

thisLanguage.context: This word describes this language itself.

signIn.context: A button that when clicked allows a user to login or register.

logout.context: A label for a button allowing a user to logout.

administration.context: A label for a button allowing a user to access the Administraion module.

linkHelp.context: This is the text for a link to the Help page.

linkAbout.context: The link text for the About link.

linkPrivacy.context: The link text for the Privacy link.

linkAccessibility.context: The link text for the Accessibility link.

linkContact.context: The link text for the Contact link.

linkApps.context: The link text for the Apps link.

linkResources.context: The link text for the Resources link.

linkFollowUs.message: フォローしてください
linkFollowUs.context: The link text for the Follow Us link.

linkTrademark.context: The link text for the Trademark link.

textTrademark.message: PEOPLE LOCATOR, ReUnite, と TriagePic はアメリカ保健福祉省の登録商標です。
textTrademark.context: Verbiage describing the three registered trademarks we hold on People Locator.

expirationDate.context: Verbiage describing the expiration date of the OMB notice.

restError1.message: エラー: ユーザ名、或いは、パスワードが違います
restError1.context: Error message presented when a user provides the incorrect username and/or password.

restError2.message: エラー: あなたのアカウントは、繰り返しログインに失敗したので、一時的にロックされています。後ほど、お試し下さい。
restError2.context: Error message presented when a user fails to login repeatedly.

restError3.message: Error: cannot sign in until your email address is confirmed, please check email for the link
restError3.context: Error message presented when a user account is not yet active.

restError2000.message: エラー: その電子メールアドレスのユーザは、既に存在しています。
restError2000.context: Error message presented when user tries to use an email address already in use.

restError2001.message: エラー: そのメールアドレスは使えません
restError2001.context: Error message presented when a user provides an invalid email address.

restError2002.message: エラー: パスワードは8-16の文字数で、少なくとも１つの大文字と、小文字、そして数字を含んでいる必要があります。
restError2002.context: Error message presented when user enters an invalid password.

restError2003.message: エラー: 人の一致がありません、そのページを再度ロードしてください
restError2003.context: Error message presented when the captcha system encounters invalid data.

restError2004.message: エラー: パスワードは不一致です
restError2004.context: Error message presented when entered password do not match one another.

passError0.message: エラー: パスワードは8-16文字の長さが必要です
passError0.context: Error message presented when entered password is of incorrect length, must be 8-16 characters long.

passError1.message: エラー: パスワードは少なくとも１文字以上の大文字(A-Z)を含んでいる必要があります
passError1.context: Error message presented when entered password does not contain at least one uppercase letter.

passError2.message: エラー: パスワードは少なくとも１文字以上の小文字(a-z)を含んでいる必要があります
passError2.context: Error message presented when entered password does not contain at least one lowercase letter.

passError3.message: エラー: パスワードは少なくとも１つ以上の数字(0-9)を含んでいる必要があります
passError3.context: Error message presented when entered password does not contain at least one digit.

restError5000.message: ネットワークのエラー.接続をチェックして、もう一度試して下さい。
restError5000.context: Error message presented when there is a network / internet issue.

restError9999.message: エラーが起きました、後ほどお試してください。
restError9999.context: Error message presented when an unknown error has occurred.

errorGettingSubscription.message: 購読情報を取得に失敗しました。ページをリロードしてください。
errorGettingSubscription.context: This error will be displayed when an error is encountered while loading the user subscription information.

errorUnsubscribing.message: 購読中止の際にエラーがおきました.
errorUnsubscribing.context: This error will be displayed when an error is encountered while the user is attempting to unsubscribe from notifications.

notifyLogin.context: This notification will appear after the user successfully logs in.

notifyRegister.message: 現在、登録されて、ログインしています.
notifyRegister.context: This notification will appear after the user newly registers and is automatically logged in.

notifyRegistering.context: This notification will appear briefly as the system registers and creates a new account for the user.

notifyPasswordChanged.message: パスワードの変更に成功しました.
notifyPasswordChanged.context: This notification will appear after the user successfully changes their password.

notifyUnsubscribed.message: 購読を中止したので、もうお知らせは届きません.
notifyUnsubscribed.context: This notification will appear after the user unsubscribed from recieving notifications.

notifySubscribed.message: 購読を開始しましたので、これからはお知らせが届くようになります.
notifySubscribed.context: This notification will appear after the user subscribes to recieving notifications.

notifyResetPassword.message: パスワードのリセットの仕方についてメールしました.
notifyResetPassword.context: This notification appears when a user has successfully sent a request to reset their password.

pad1login.context: This is the name of the first tab of the user dialog allowing a user to login.

pad1register.context: This is the name of the second tab of the user dialog allowing a user to register.

pad1forgotText.message: メールアドレスを入力してください、そうするとパスワードのリセットの仕方をお送りします.
pad1forgotText.context: This text informs the user of what they must do in order to reset their password ~ they must enter their email address.

pad1forgotSend.context: This is the text label on the forgot my password dialog to submit the form.

pad1loginForgot.context: This is the text label for the forgot my password button on the login dialog.

pad1loginUsernamePlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the username input.

pad1loginPasswordPlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the password input.

pad1registerEmailPlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the email input.

pad1registerText.message: パスワードには一つ以上の数字、小文字、大文字、そして8-16の文字数が必要です。
pad1registerText.context: This is the text displayed while the user is in the process of registering informing them of our minimum password requirements.

omb7notice.context: This is the first word of the OMB notice.

omb7submission.message: 情報の提供は、任意です。提出された情報は全て公開されます。
omb7submission.context: These are the first two sentences of the OMB notice.

omb7text.message: この情報収集の報告負荷は、一件に付き平均３分です。これは、注意書きをチェックして、情報を集め、入力する時間を含んでいます。現在有効なOMB制御番号が表示されていない限り、この情報収集に関し、当局は、実行に移すことも関与することもなく、応答を要求されることはありません。この情報提供に関し予想される負荷について、或いは、報告負荷を減らすための助言を含め、他の観点からのコメントは、ここへ、お送り下さい:
omb7text.context: This is the main paragraph of the OMB notice.

omb7sub.message: 私は、これを読み同意しました。
omb7sub.context: This is the label for the OMB notice agreement button.

pad3following.context: This is the name of the first tab of user preferences that shows which records a user is following.

pad3settings.context: This is the name of the second tab of user preferences that shows user settings.

pad3loading.context: This word is displayed when the following records tab is loading results from the server.

pad3emptyFollow.message: レコードをフォローしていません。
pad3emptyFollow.context: This verbiage is displayed when the following records panel is displayed and the user is not following any records.

pad3unFollow.context: This is the text label applied to the button that allows a user to unfollow updates to a record.

pad3subStatusUnsubscribed.context: This text label tells of the status of the user not being subscribed to recieve notifications.

pad3subStatusSubscribed.context: This text label tells the status of the user being subscribed to recieve notifications.

pad3subscribeTo.context: This is the title text to the section that allows a user to opt-in to recieve push notifications.

pad3Time.message: 新しいイベントがあった場合には、時々、ユーザにお知らせを送ることがあります。
pad3Time.context: This verbiage describes the extent to which we use the push notification subscription a user provides to send out information.

pad3changePasswordButton.context: This verbiage describes the extent to which we use the push notification subscription a user provides to send out information.

pad3passwordRequirements.message: パスワードには一つ以上の数字、小文字、大文字、そして8-16の文字数が必要です。
pad3passwordRequirements.context: This verbiage describes the extent to which we use the push notification subscription a user provides to send out information.

pad3oldPasswordPlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the old password input.

pad3newPassword1Placeholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the new password input.

pad3newPassword2Placeholder.message: 再度、新しいパスワード
pad3newPassword2Placeholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the new password again input.

pushNotificationsUnsupported.message: あなたのブラウザーは、プッシュ型のお知らせをサポートしていません。
pushNotificationsUnsupported.context: This text tells the user that their current web browser does not support the push notification feature.

pushNotificationsDisallowed.message: あなたは、このサイトに、お知らせを表示するのを禁止しています。あなたは、この設定を変える許可を再度与えなければなりません。
pushNotificationsDisallowed.context: This text tells the user that they have prohibited the site from using push notifications and that they must re-enable this feature to subscribe.

helpFindTitle.context: This is the title of the help page section on how to find/search.

helpFindText.message: 不明の人・動物を捜索しているのなら、ここの災害イベントを探せば、彼らを見つけられるかもしれません。このPEOPLE LOCATORが初めてなら、まず災害イベントに登録された一覧をご覧下さい。各イベントには名前がつけられていて、そのイベントに関係したイメージとその状況を説明した文章があります。スクロールダウンすると、いくつかの災害イベントをみることができ、そこでイベントを選んでください。探している人・動物に最も関係がありそうなイベントを選んで下さい。例えば、ハイチ地震というイベントがあり、あなたが探している人を最後に見たのがハイチなら、そのイベントを選んで下さい。そのイメージの下にあるグリーンボタンをタッチ/クリックしてイベントを選んで下さい；そうすればその災害イベントの検索エンジンに直接アクセスできます。新しく、検索欄が一番上に表示されます。この検索欄にあなたが探したい人の名前を入れて下さい。その結果は、関係してそうな順番に自動的に更新されて表示されます。各レコードに表示されている、「さらに詳細」というリンクをタップ（クリック）することで、詳細ビューが開いて、さらに情報を得ることができます。この詳細ビューは、そのレコードについてのさらなる情報を見ることができ、また、その情報を更新してフォローできます。
helpFindText.context: This is the help page article body describing in detail how to find/search for a person or animal.

helpReportTitle.context: This is the title of the help page section on how to report.

helpReportText.message: あなたの探している人・動物が見つからない場合は、このPEOPLE LOCATORに登録すべきです。この災害イベントにナビゲートされたなら、ピンクの＋印のフローティングボタンがスクリーンの右下にいつも見えるでしょう。このボタンをタッピング（クリック）するとウィザードが開始され、その指示に従い各情報を入れていくと、簡単に登録が完了します。登録が終了すると、そのレポートは公開され、検索できるようになります。報告が完成し（匿名で登録していない場合）登録されると、自動的にその情報の更新のフォローが始まります。他の人があなたのレコードにコメントをすることができ、報告した人・動物についての新しい情報があなたに提供されます。このレコードをフォローすることができるので、更新情報があなたに、メール或いはプッシュ型で送られます。
helpReportText.context: This is the help page article body describing in detail how to report a person or animal.

pageAboutTextAbout.message: このサイトは、米国メリランド州ベセスダにある米国国立医学図書館(NLM:National Library of Medicine),により提供されています。NLM(米国国立医学図書館)は、米国保健福祉省の米国国立保健医学研究所の一つで、 健康サービス提供を改善するためのコミュニケーション技術の開発、およびそのコーディネートを、その使命としています。このサイトは、災害時に素早く対応出来る便利なツールを研究する目的で提供されています。これらの基礎技術は、Lost Person Finder(LPF)プロジェクトを通して開発され、Bethesda Hospitals’ Emergency Preparedness Partnershipに対し米国国立医学図書館が貢献している部分です。このPartnershipは、最初は2008年のLPFとNLM ITプロジェクトとして国家予算を受けていました。現在、このLPFプロジェクトは、NIHのNLMのLister Hill National Center for Biomedical Communications (LH-NCBC) の内部の研究プログラムによりサポートされています。ソフト開発は、LH-NCBCのCEB(Communication Engineering Branch) により主導され、さらに、LHNCBCの、Computer Science Branch(CSB), the Disaster Information Management Research Center (DIMRC) そしてNLMのSpecialized Information Services(SIS)のコンテンツを含んでいます。
pageAboutTextAbout.context: This is the first paragraph of verbiage on the About page describing the purpose of the PEOPLE LOCATOR.

pageAboutTextBrowser.message: ウェブブラウザーでは、cookieとJavaScriptが使えなければなりません。また、最新のバージョンの、つぎのウェブブラウザーが必要: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Edge, 或いは Internet Explorer.
pageAboutTextBrowser.context: This is the text on the About page describing web browsers support.

pageAboutHeaderBrowser.message: ブラウザーのサポート
pageAboutHeaderBrowser.context: On the About page, section header title Browser Support.

pageAboutHeaderFAQ.message: データシートとよくされる質問(FAQ)
pageAboutHeaderFAQ.context: On the About page, this is the link to datasheets and the FAQ.

pageAboutFAQ.context: Frequently Asked Questions link title on About page.

pagePrivacyText1.message: 特に示されていない限り、このウェブサイトに含まれるコミュニティの情報は、公開されおり、ウェブを訪れる人々から検索可能になっています。データは、NLMへ直接報告のあった各レコードに示されていように、いろいろなソースから受け取ったものです。 :
pagePrivacyText1.context: This is the first text paragraph on the Privacy page describing how user data is handled.

pagePrivacyText2a.context: Beginning of the second paragraph on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText2b.message: このサイトはmoderatorによりチェックされておらず、このウェブに表示されている情報のレビューや正確さに関して、関連している機関には期待できません。直接提供された情報を受け取っていることにご注意
pagePrivacyText2b.context: Large portion of the second paragraph of the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText2c.message: 失踪した人々の捜索をサポートしている他の組織、研究所や機構、これらに限られず、渡されることがあります。
pagePrivacyText2c.context: End portion of the second paragraph of the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText3a.message: ーへ直接提出されるので
pagePrivacyText3a.context: Beginning of the third paragraph on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText3b.message: 報告者の電子メールアドレスおよびデバイスのIDが保存されますが、そのまま公開されることはありません。
pagePrivacyText3b.context: End of the third paragraph on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText4.message: NLM（米国国立医学図書館）全体におけるプライバシー規約
pagePrivacyText4.context: Text for the link to NLM's privacy policy page.

pagePrivacyText5.message: 情報自由における法律

forMore.context: The title for a subsection on the Privacy page with links to more topics.

followUs.context: Used to prompt user to follow us on a social network of their choice.

and.context: The word and used between two nouns.

trademarkText.message: 米国保健福祉省の商標として登録されています。

tabDisasterEvents.context: The title of the 1st tab allowing the selection of particular Disaster Events.

tabFind.context: The title of the 2nd tab allowing someone to Find a person or animal.

tabReport.context: The title of the 3rd tab allowing someone to Report a new person or animal.

tagline.message: 災害時における行方不明の家族、友人、動物の捜索と報告。

pageTitle.message: Find and report missing people or animals during disasters

eventRetired.message: リクエストされた災害イベントは終了いたしました。

records.context: When a search is performed this word is prefixed with the number of results, ie.17 records

moreDetails.context: When search results are displayed, a user can click on the more details link to open the record displaying all record data.

statusUnknown.context: Status, Location, or other attribute is Unknown

explainNameA.context: The text label for name entry of an animal.

explainBuddyA.context: The text label for buddty identification number entry of an animal.

reportChoiceNameUnknownP.message: もし人の名前が不確かなら、不明を選んで下さい。
reportChoiceNameUnknownP.context: This is the section title displayed for the use to choose name unknown.

reportChoiceNameUnknownA.message: もし動物の名前・登録番号が不確かなら、不明を選んで下さい。
reportChoiceNameUnknownA.context: This is the sextion title displayed when the user does not know name and buddy identification number.

explainNameUnknownP.context: The label next to the person name selection button for unknown.

explainNameUnknownA.message: 動物の名前・登録番号は不明です
explainNameUnknownA.context: The label next to the animal name selection button for unknown.

cameraError.message: あなたのウェブブラウザでは、カメラを検出されませんでした。そのかわりにあなたのカメラアプリを利用できます。
cameraError.context: This toast notification is displayed when there is an error detecting the camera on the user device.

browserLimitation.message: あなたのウェブブラウザはこの機能をサポートしていません。
browserLimitation.context: This toast notification is displayed when a user attempts to use a feature that their web browser does not support.

photoOnly.message: JPEG, PNG, and TIFF image files only.
photoOnly.context: This toast notification is displayed when a user attempts to use an unsupported image file format in search by photo or report.

reportChoicePhotoP.message: この人の同定を向上させるのに写真を加えることもできます。
reportChoicePhotoP.context: Section titled telling user that they can add a photo for identification purposes.

reportChoicePhotoA.message: この動物の同定を向上させるのに写真を加えることもできます。
reportChoicePhotoA.context: Section titled telling user that they can add a photo for identification purposes.

reportChoicePhotoCapture.context: This is the button label used to capture a photograph using the device camera.

reportChoicePhotoSelectFile.context: This is the button label used to select an image file from local device storage.

reportChoicePhotoTake.context: This is the button label used to open the device camera before capturing an image.

reportChoicePhotoDelete.context: This is the button label used to delete an image the user has already submitted.

reportChoicePhotoHelp.message: 必要なら写真を回転したり、範囲を限定したりできます。
reportChoicePhotoHelp.context: This is the help text displayed below image manipulation controls informing the user how to alter the already submitted image.

reportChoiceMapP.message: この人の捜索を助けるために、地図で示すことができます。
reportChoiceMapP.context: This is the section header above the map used to specify a last known location.

reportChoiceMapA.message: この動物の捜索を助けるために、地図で示すことができます。
reportChoiceMapA.context: This is the section header above the map used to specify a last known location.

reportChoiceMapHelp.message: マップのマーカを最後に居たと思われる場所にドラッグしてください。
reportChoiceMapHelp.context: This is the help text below the last know location map informing a user what to do.

information.context: This a label for a tab in the reporting wizard where a user enters free text about additional Information.

submit.context: This a label for a tab in the reporting wizard where a user finalizes and submits the report.

submitAnon.context: This a label for a tab in the reporting wizard where a user finalizes and submits the report anonymously.

reportChoiceInformationHelpP.message: この人を同定するのに、或いは、居場所を特定するのに役立つと思われる情報を加えることができます。
reportChoiceInformationHelpP.context: This is help text informing the user that the information they enter will assist in locating or identifying the person.

reportChoiceInformationHelpA.message: この動物を同定するのに、或いは、居場所を特定するのに役立つと思われる情報を加える事ができます。
reportChoiceInformationHelpA.context: This is help text informing the user that the information they enter will assist in locating or identifying the animal.

reportBeingSubmittedToast.context: This toast notification will be displayed while the report is being sent in.

reportSubmit.context: This is the section title on the last page of the reporting wizard.The user will choose how to submit the report.

explainSignInP.message: この人に関する情報が加えられた時にお知らせが欲しい場合は、報告を提出する前にサインインしてください。
explainSignInP.context: If the user is not signed in, we will prompt them to sign in so that they can recieve updates to their reported record.

explainSignInA.message: この動物に関する情報が加えられた時にお知らせが欲しい場合は、報告を提出する前にサインインしてください。
explainSignInA.context: If the user is not signed in, we will prompt them to sign in so that they can recieve updates to their reported record.

explainSubmitP.message: この人に関する情報が加えられたときにお知らせが欲しい場合、今、報告提出を選んでください。
explainSubmitP.context: If the user is already signed in, we will ask them to submit the record and subscribe to updates.

explainSubmitA.message: この動物に関する情報が加えられたときにお知らせが欲しい場合は、今、報告提出を選んで下さい。
explainSubmitA.context: If the user is already signed in, we will ask them to submit the record and subscribe to updates.

explainAnonP.message: 匿名で提出した場合、この人についての情報更新があっても、連絡は届きません。
explainAnonP.context: The user is prompted that they may choose to submit their report anonymoysly and not recieve any updates afterwards.

explainAnonA.message: 匿名で提出した場合、この動物について情報更新があっても、連絡は届きません。
explainAnonA.context: The user is prompted that they may choose to submit their report anonymoysly and not recieve any updates afterwards.

explainAnon2.message: This record will expire after 90 days. Use the “Report Abuse” button in the MORE DETAILS view later on to request an earlier expiration.
explainAnon2.context: The user is prompted that they may choose to submit their report anonymoysly and not recieve any updates afterwards.

reportComplete.message: レポート提出完了、有り難うございました.
reportComplete.context: This is the section title on the final page of the reporting wizard.The report has been completed.

explainCopy1.message: これはあなたが提出したレポートのURLです。あとで情報を更新したり、コメントを加えるのにこのURLで戻って来れます。
explainCopy1.context: We inform the user of the URL that corresponds to the report they just completed so that they may bookkmark or share it for later.

explainCopy2.message: このURLを共有したりブックマークできるようにクリップボードにコピーして下さい。
explainCopy2.context: This is the text below the copy to clipboard button informing the user what the button does.

buddyIdentificationNumber.context: This is the label to the Buddy Identification Number field which is displayed for animals.

notifyRecordFollow.message: あなたは、このレコードをフォローし、情報が更新されたり、コメントが加えられた場合、お知らせが届きます。
notifyRecordFollow.context: This notification will appear after the user unfollows a record via the full record view.

notifyRecordUnfollow.message: このレコードを、もうフォローしていません。
notifyRecordUnfollow.context: This notification will appear after the user unfollows a record via the full record view.

followStatusTrue.context: This label is displayed next to a toggle switch displaying that the user is folliwng the currently viewed record.

followStatusFalse.message: フォローしていません
followStatusFalse.context: This label is displayed next to a toggle switch displaying that the user is not folliwng the currently viewed record.

followButtonExplain.message: このレコードについて更新があったり、コメントがあった場合、お知らせを受けます。
followButtonExplain.context: This label is displayed below the follow user toggle button explaining what the button does.

followButtonAnon.message: レコードをフォローし情報更新のお知らせを受けるには、最初にサインインしなければなりません。
followButtonAnon.context: The follow record button is disabled when a user is not signed in, aka anonymous.We inform them that to follow a record they must first sign in.

longerComment.message: もうすこし長いコメントを入力してください
longerComment.context: The user is notified to enter a longer comment if it is too short

commentBeingSubmittedToast.context: This toast notification will be displayed while the new comment is being sent in.

eventInvalid.message: このイベントは存在しません。
eventInvalid.context: If the user comes to the site with a direct URL linking to an invalid event, this toast notification will appear.

moduleInvalid.message: このモジュールは存在しません。
moduleInvalid.context: If the user attempts to access a non-existant portion of the site (very unlikely) this toast notification will appear.

moduleAccess.message: あなたは、このモジュールにアクセスする許可がありません。
moduleAccess.context: If the user attempts to access a portion of the site they do not have permission for, this toast notification will appear.

copyTrue.message: URLはクリップボードにコピーされました。
copyTrue.context: After the user clicks on the copy to clipboard button, if successful, this toast notification will appear.

copyFalse.message: URLをクリップボードにコピーできませんでした。
copyFalse.context: After the user clicks on the copy to clipboard button, if unsuccessful, this toast notification will appear.

userConfirmActive.message: あなたのメールアドレスの確認され、アカウントは利用出来るようになりました。
userConfirmActive.context: When the user visits a confirmation link emailed to them, this toast notification will appear informing the user that their account is now active and email address verified.

userConfirmInvalid.message: この確認リンクは有効ではありません。
userConfirmInvalid.context: When the user vists an invalid email address confirmation link or an invalid password reset confirmation link, this toast notification will appear.

userPasswordTwo.message: 新しいパスワードは、あなた宛にメールされました。
userPasswordTwo.context: When the user visits a valid password reset confirmation link, this toast notification will appear to notify the user a new password has been generated and emailed to them.

eurl1.context: This section text is displayed on the paper action dialog when a user clicks the share event button.

eurl2.message: ボタンを押して、このイベントのURLをクリップボードにコピーしてください。そうすれば共有したりブックマークできます。
eurl2.context: This text is displayed below the -copy to clipboard- button on the share event paper action dialog.

page404.message: 404: このページは存在しません。
page404.context: This toast is displayed when a user attempts to visit a non-existant page.

ombNoticeTitle.context: This is the page title for the OMB Notice.

abuseReportAbuse.context: This is used as a sectional header and the label of the report abuse button.

abuseWhatReport.message: What would you like to report?
abuseWhatReport.context: This is the query presented to a user when asked to be more specific about the type of abuse report the user is filing.

abuseReportSpam.context: This is the button label to select a report abuse claim of type spam.

abuseReportSex.context: This is the button label to select a report abuse claim of type sexually explicit.

abuseReportHate.context: This is the button label to select a report abuse claim of type hate speech.

abuseReportViolence.context: This is the button label to select a report abuse claim of type violence

abuseReportElse.context: This button label is to select a report abuse claim of type something else.

abuseThanks.message: Thanks. We have received your abuse claim. Our site staff will review this record and remove any inappropriate content.

deleteRecord.context: This is used as a button label and dialog header allowing a user to delete a record from the system.

deleteRecordConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this record? There is no way to recover your record data once it has been deleted.
deleteRecordConfirm.context: This is the question prompting a user when they choose to delete a record. We confirm they are certain with their decision.

deleteRecordCancel.context: Button label to cancel the action of deleting a record.

deleteRecordDelete.context: Button label to confirm the deletion of a record.

deleteRecordDone.context: A toast notification displayed to inform the user the deletion of a record action has been completed.

seconds.context: This word means seconds of time.

record.context: When a search is performed this word is prefixed with the number of results, ie. 1 record -- special case when only 1 result

notifyLogout.context: This notification will appear after the user successfully logs out.

uploadingPhoto.context: This message is displayed after a user selects an image file to search by photo as the file is being uploaded.

searchByPhoto.context: When a user elects to search by photo from the search query bar, a dialog box appears with this as the title.

dragAndDrop.context: A user may drag and drop a file to search by image. This message shows the user where to drag and drop the file ~ the target.

emailRecordRevisionSubject.message: A record you are following has been updated
emailRecordRevisionSubject.context: We email users following a record when a revision is made or a comment is added, this is the subject of that email.

emailRecordRevisionLine1.message: A comment has been added or a revision made to a record you are following.
emailRecordRevisionLine1.context: We email users following a record when a revision is made or a comment is added, this is the first line of that email.

emailRecordRevisionLine2.message: You can review the record at this location:
emailRecordRevisionLine2.context: We email users following a record when a revision is made or a comment is added, this line prefixes the direct record url.

emailRecordRevisionLine3.message: If you want to unsubscribe from these email alerts, visit the link above and untoggle the Following button.
emailRecordRevisionLine3.context: We email users following a record when a revision is made or a comment is added, at the end we inform the user of how to unsubscribe to these emails.

emailNewUserSubject.context: We email new users after they register, this is the subject line of said email.

emailNewUserLine1.context: We email new users after they register, this is the first line of said email thanking them for registering.

emailNewUserLine2.message: You must visit the link below in order to complete the registration process:
emailNewUserLine2.context: We email new users after they register, this is the second line of said email providing them a link complete the registration process.

emailNewUserLine3.message: Failure to visit the link will result in your account being deleted after 30 days.
emailNewUserLine3.context: We email new users after they register, this is the last line of said email warning the user about account deletion for failure to activate their account.

emailForgot1Subject.context: We email a user when they initiate the forgot password sequence, this is the subject of that email.

emailForgot1Line1.message: Someone has initiated a password reset request for your account.
emailForgot1Line1.context: We email a user when they initiate the forgot password sequence, this is the first line of that email.

emailForgot1Line2.message: If you did not initiate this request, it is safe to ignore this email and your password will not be changed.
emailForgot1Line2.context: We email a user when they initiate the forgot password sequence, we inform the user it is safe to ignore this request if they did not initiate it.

emailForgot1Line3.message: However, if you did initiate this request and would prefer to reset your password, you must visit the following link:
emailForgot1Line3.context: We email a user when they initiate the forgot password sequence, this line prefixes a url the user must click on to continue in the forgot password sequence.

emailForgot1Line4.message: Once this link has been visited, a new password will be generated and sent to you in a second email.
emailForgot1Line4.context: We email a user when they initiate the forgot password sequence, final line of this email informing a new password will be generated.

emailForgot2Subject.context: This is the second email in the forgot password sequence, and this is the subject of that email.

emailForgot2Line1.context: This is the second email in the forgot password sequence, this line prefixes the new password we generated for the user.

emailForgot2Line2.message: You may optionally change your password after signing in:
emailForgot2Line2.context: This is the second email in the forgot password sequence, lastly, we inform the user that they may change their password after logging in.

welcomeTo.context: The first time a user comes to PL, we welcome them like: Welcome to PEOPLE LOCATOR. However PEOPLE LOCATOR is not translated in this welcome message.

chooseLanguage.context: We prompt the user to select a language at first visit.

zoomPhoto.context: This is s menu button action that shows a larger version of the image from a record.

shareRecord.context: This is a menu button action allowing a user to share a direct link to a record.

additionalInformation.context: This is a label displayed several places titled Additional Information.
